general.description:
Oshiinal is a mainly oceanic moon, with a few rich land masses and an ecosystem 80% biocompatible with esshiinan life.
It was initially colonized to become a seafood source for the Baartish. Then, numerous jump routes were discovered, linking the new colony to other important planets. So, Oshiinal also became a de facto trade nexus, far wealthier than expected by the first settlers. It is now becoming a resort for the most richest people in the entire Baartish.
general.bar: The patrons at the bar are mainly so-called "golden beaks" Sshaads : insanely well-off master-merchants
